physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Elevated urinary uroporphyrin and serum iron levels detected.
Elevated urinary uroporphyrin and serum iron levels detected again.
Vesicles, bullae, and small erosions on hands and forearms; remarkable hyperpigmentation noted; highly elevated levels of urinary uroporphyrin, serum iron, and ferritin.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased severity of skin manifestations and higher requirement of phlebotomy compared to previous instances.
